meanings.sent1: The favose design of the cake made it look like a honeycomb.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a favose pattern to create a unique texture on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The favose tiles on the floor made it seem like walking on a giant honeycomb.
meanings.sent4: The favose clouds in the sky resembled a vast honeycomb above us.
meanings.sent5: The favose structure of the building was both intricate and beautiful.

meanings.sent1: The favose material of the beehive provided a secure home for the bees.
meanings.sent2: The favose structure of the coral reef offered shelter to various sea creatures.
meanings.sent3: The favose appearance of the sponge cake delighted the party guests.
meanings.sent4: The favose layers of the rock formation revealed its ancient history.
meanings.sent5: The favose texture of the fabric added a unique touch to the dress.

meanings.definition: Having a honeycomb pattern or texture.
meanings.sent1: The favose wallpaper in the room gave it a cozy and inviting feel.
meanings.sent2: The favose texture of the tree bark provided camouflage for the insects.
meanings.sent3: The favose design on the tablecloth added a touch of elegance to the dinner party.
meanings.sent4: The favose pattern on the butterfly's wings helped it blend into the flowers.
meanings.sent5: The favose appearance of the snowflake was mesmerizing to behold.
